sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.id FROM student JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND class.class_name = '2022级计算机科学与技术1班' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS student_count FROM base

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“年级/入学年份（如 2022 级）”及 probe_samples 中 class.grade_year 的候选值 ['2022', '2024', '2023', '2025']，'22级' 映射为 '2022'（精确语义对应：22级 = 2022级）
根据 probe_samples 中 class.class_name 的候选值，'计科一班' 是 '2022级计算机科学与技术1班' 的常见简称；该值在候选集中唯一匹配 2022 级且含 '计算机科学与技术' 和 '1班' 的条目，归一化为 '2022级计算机科学与技术1班'

output.executed_sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.id FROM student JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND class.class_name = '2022级计算机科学与技术1班' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS student_count FROM base
